Entries.MrGinger.1: 'East of the Sun, West of the Moon'. Mr. Ginger can read?!

Entries.NPC.cs.4274: Oh! This is great! I like these human gift-giving customs!$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4276: Oooh, a gift for me! Because I'm a year older? What an achievement! Thanks!$4/Oooh, a gift for me? Because I'm a year older? What an achievement! Thanks!$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4277: Oooh, a gift for me! Because I'm a year older? What an achievement! Thanks!$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4278: It's my birthday? So you're giving me trash? Interesting human custom.$3/It's my birthday? So you're giving me trash? Interesting human custom.$3/
Entries.NPC.cs.4279: It's my birthday? And this is the customary useless offering?$3
Entries.NPC.cs.4280: Oh! A gift for me? Today's my birthday? Ah, you humans have such quaint customs.
Entries.NPC.cs.4281: Oh! A gift for me? Today's my birthday? Ah, you humans have such quaint customs.

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: Well, this is unusual, but very well, if you insist. *Clears throat*#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to support @ and, erm, Mr. Ginger in pledging their dedication to one another.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: Well, this is unusual, but very well, if you insist. *Clears throat*#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to support @ and, erm, Mr. Ginger in pledging their dedication to one another.
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Ginger... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you companions for life!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Ginger... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you companions for life!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5379: You may, um, hug or something?
Entries.Game1.cs.2782: Oooh, that was fun, wasn't it?$3#$e#And now here I am, living on a farm! Do you have any rats or mice? Well, not for long!$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4439: A miniature human stumbling around? It better not step on my tail!#$b#Still, whatever makes you happy. I'll deal.$3
Entries.NPC.cs.4440: Let me get this straight: you fill in some paperwork, and they deliver a baby to the door?#$b#That's much less messy than the way cats do things.
Entries.NPC.cs.4441: Mirp? {0}, I accidently chewed on the adoption papers.#$b#What? They were fluttering in the wind, I thought they were a moth.
Entries.NPC.cs.4444: Babies... they're human kittens, right? This is gonna be great! I'm gonna teach it to hunt, and climb trees and... what?$1
Entries.NPC.cs.4447: What sort of things do babies like? Sleeping, screaming?#$b#Those big fluffy fake animals with glass eyes? You can keep those away from me! Freakish things.
Entries.NPC.cs.4448: Let me get this straight: you fill in some paperwork, and they deliver a baby to the door?#$b#That's much less messy than the way cats do things.
Entries.NPC.cs.4449: I need a minute to myself...  Hey, they're not MY kids.$5
Entries.NPC.cs.4462: I got up early and watered some crops for you. And you know how I feel about water!
Entries.NPC.cs.4463: #$e#Oh, and I filled {0}'s water bowl. Poor, simple house pets, don't know enough to find their own water.
Entries.NPC.cs.4465: Mirrrp? Have you brought me something delicious {0}?
Entries.NPC.cs.4466: *yawns* Ah, good morning, {0}. I was just catching up on my beauty sleep.
Entries.NPC.cs.4470: I got up early to water your crops, and almost got doused by the sprinklers!$2#$b#They're evil, I tell you, evil!.$5
Entries.NPC.cs.4474: I got up early and fed all your dim-witted farm animals. Now you've more time to catch me fish.$1
Entries.NPC.cs.4481: I couldn't sleep, so I got up and repaired a few of the fences. Can't have the animals running away, can we?
Entries.NPC.cs.4500: Humans... can't tidy up after themselves. What sort of mess do you call this? At least all I leave is my fur.

Entries.NPC.cs.4439: A baby... who would've thought? Me, a dad.
Entries.NPC.cs.4440: {0}, do you think they'll approve our adoption request? What if they don't?#$b#What if they do? I'm gonna be a dad!
Entries.NPC.cs.4441: {0}, I filed our adoption papers. Now we wait for a baby to be delivered like a mail package? Weird.
Entries.NPC.cs.4444: {0}, we're going to have a baby soon. They don't come with an instruction manual, do they?
Entries.NPC.cs.4447: {0}, we're going to have a baby. There's like this weird fluttering in my belly.$2#$b#What if I'm not a good dad?$2
Entries.NPC.cs.4448: {0}, I can't believe you're pregnant. That this is my life now.$4
Entries.NPC.cs.4449: I need a minute to myself, {0}. Kids are pretty full-on.$2
Entries.NPC.cs.4462: I got up early and watered some crops for you. Nothing like a breath of fresh morning air.
Entries.NPC.cs.4470: I got up early to water your crops, and almost got doused by the sprinklers!$2
Entries.NPC.cs.4474: I got up early and fed all the farm animals. That should make things easier today.
Entries.NPC.cs.4481: I couldn't sleep, so I got up and repaired a few of the fences. Can't have the animals running away, can we just?
Entries.NPC.cs.4500: You've left stuff littered all over the place again, @. Would you please tidy it up? If I do, I'll just put it in the wrong place.

Changes.LogName: Adopting a baby with the cat

Entries.MisterGinger0: You do realize I'm a cat, don't you?#$b#Good, just checking.#$b#I'm fairly certain this is unorthodox even by your strange human standards, but fish and cheese for the rest of my life?$3
Entries.MisterGinger1: Do you doubt me, @? Everything is under control. I have contacts, you know.$1#$b#Well, _a_ contact, and that's Ras. But he's pretty good at getting stuff sorted.$4

Entries.MisterGinger: Murrrr.....$2
Gah, I hate rain. Still, a good excuse to stay inside and sleep, right?
Murr!
A festival to celebrate those miniature dinosaurs? Why?$2#$b#And the tiny little ones, they're not even a mouthful. Not worth the effort.
Entries.MisterGinger_spouse: Hello favorite human! I hope you're planning on thrashing Abby at the egg hunt!

Entries.MisterGinger: Mirrup!
Hm... Do you think Marlon's ever gonna ask her to dance?$1#$b#I've seen him face down terrifying monsters, what's he got to lose? His other eye?$3
Entries.MisterGinger_spouse: I suppose I *could* be persuaded to dance. But it had better not end up on MewTube!$3

Entries.Event.cs.1632: There's only one person here I'd like to dance with.$2#$b#It's you, of course!$1

Entries.MisterGinger: If you wanna dance with me, better get in quick! Pretty sure Abigail's got her eyes on me.$4
Mirrp?
I wouldn't eat the soup if I were you. It's gonna taste like mouse entrails and old socks. #$b#Why? Cos that's what I added.$3
Not gonna lie, I'm mostly here for the buffet - and to spend time with you, obviously.$1
Mirrup!
They're not made of jelly, and they're not fish.#$b#Why do humans give things stupid names?
Romantic? Well, I suppose it might be if the whole town hadn't come down to watch them.#$b#Okay, I admit it, they're kinda pretty.
Mirrup!
Are you gonna get your fortune told, @? Ras thinks she's the real deal, but I don't know...#$b#She'll probably just tell you there's a dark handsome stranger in your future.
Entries.MisterGinger_spouse: I'll tell your fortune for free, @.#$b#It involves fish and a warm bed.$3

Entries.MisterGinger: Dark handsome stranger, eh? Is that what she told you.$6#$b#She's a wise woman, Madame Welwick.
Me-ow?
What if I'm this golden 'Pumpkin' that everyone is looking for?$2
Entries.MisterGinger_spouse: Spirit's eve makes my whiskers tingle. But maybe that's just the pumpkin spice.

Entries.MisterGinger: Don't tell Marnie, but as soon as she's distracted by the Mayor and his "important duties", Jas and me are totally gonna sneak into the maze.$3#$b#The golden pumpkin shall be ours!$1
Don't tell Marnie, but as soon as she's distracted by her warrior-pirate, Jas and me are totally gonna sneak into the maze.$3#$b#The golden pumpkin shall be ours!$1
Mirp!
*singing* 'Fish, fish, my favorite dish'. Oh, hello @.$1#$b#Do you think if I ask nicely, they'll let me take some of these home?$4#$b#They're just gonna toss 'em back? What a waste.$2
Entries.MisterGinger_spouse: Catch lots of fish! Maybe we can smuggle some out. What else are pockets for? $3

Entries.MisterGinger: Fur's warmer on a day like this!#$b#Come, join us, Linus knows some pretty good yarns.
Murrr...$2
What? I'm not sulking cos no-one brought me a gift!$2#$b#Well, except for Jas!$1
Entries.MisterGinger_spouse: Ooh, which ones do you think are for me, @?$1#$b#I hope you got me something good!$4

Entries.MisterGinger: I hope Jas likes the present I got her... I've never been able to buy her books before.

Farmhouse/warp Stranger 12 17/warp farmer 12 19/viewport 13 15/pause 500/emote Stranger 28/pause 500/quickQuestion #She turned you into a cat?#What happened next?#Where's the girl now?#Why didn't you tell me?#Why aren't you ginger?(break)speak Stranger "Yes, yes she did. And a cat I have been ever since. Until today."(break)speak Stranger "I wandered lost, confused, and so very hungry.#$b#A kind man took me in and fed me - until I ran away. The valley called me home."(break)speak Stranger "Not far from here, in town. But... she's gone, @. I wasn't there to protect her. She died.$2"(break)speak Stranger "That's the nature of a curse, @. I couldn't speak aloud of my... my condition.$2#$b#Besides, if you knew, it would forfeit the remedy.$3"(break)speak Stranger "Because I'm not? Why not a black cat? Only one person knows.$3#$b#And I don't want to ask her. Do you?$2"/pause 1000/speak Stranger "My name was - IS - Tristan.#$b#And I'm sure you're wondering what broke the enchantment?$1#$b#What do you think? You've read fairy tales, haven't you?$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Stranger "Yes, my dear. Love. I know, it's totally corny.$4#$b#It was your love for a cat that broke the spell. And a hope, perhaps, that you could love the man as well.$3"/quickQuestion #I preferred the cat.#This is a lot. I need to think it over.#Oh, I guessed weeks ago.#Cat, man. Whatever. I love you too.(break)speak Stranger "Oh....#$b#Sorry I'm not the... the person you wanted me to be.$2#$b#I've ruined everything. I'm sorry. I'll see myself out.#$b#Goodnight @.$2"(break)speak Stranger "I understand. I'll give you some space. I can let myself out. I have thumbs again.$2#$b#I'll see you tomorrow. I hope?$2"(break)speak Stranger "Ah, I knew you were onto it the moment we first met.$1#$b#And I suppose leaving books of fairy tales lying around wasn't exactly subtle.$3#$b#So... um, does that mean you want to stick with me? That you're good with this whole weird situation?$4"(break)speak Stranger "Really? You really mean that? Oh, @, I'm so pleased.$1#$b#And I have hands now. And lips. I've been wanting to kiss you for so long.$4#$b#That's not weird is it? Okay, it's a little bit weird... am I babbling? I think I'm babbling...$1#$b#Why don't you come over here and make me shut up?$6"/end invisible MisterGinger

Your forehead is doing that weird creasing thing and you stink of unhappiness.$2#$b#Which is similar to stewed cabbage, if you were curious."/pause 400/quickQuestion #Last night you were a man?#I had a terrible dream.#Are you really a cat?(break)jump MisterGinger 3\speak MisterGinger "What??! A man!$5#$b#To no longer have this luxurious fur, this magnificant tail!#$b#What a disgusting notion!"(break)speak MisterGinger "Oh! What kind of dream?#$b#You dreamt I was a man? A disgusting, furless man!$5#$b#Ugh! Oh, sorry, no offence intended. But, gross! Your kind are clearly inferior to mine.$2"(break)speak MisterGinger "Hmmm, philosophy this early in the morning? What is it, do you think, to be a cat?$3#$b#Four paws, check. Pointed ears, check. Manificent fluffy tail, all accounted for. Charming purr? Yep.$1#$b#I would say, all evidence confirms that yes, I am a cat.$4"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Is that all that was bothering you, @?"/quickQuestion #Yep, that was about it.#Do you love me, Mr. Ginger#I'm hungry, shall we get breakfast?(break)speak MisterGinger "Oh that's good! You had me worried there, you humans can be such moody creatures.#$b#Want me to catch you something small and squeaky for breakfast?#$b#No? Okay. Now, speaking of cheese...$4"/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 20/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end

Entries.50706135/e 50706130/t 600 1000: none/64 18/MisterGinger 64 16 0 farmer 64 15 2/skippable/addTemporaryActor GingerCute 16 16 -100 -100 2 false/addTemporaryActor JasCute 16 16 -1000 -1000 2 false/addTemporaryActor MarnShane 32 16 -1000 -1000 2 false/addTemporaryActor MarnCute 16 16 -1000 -1000 2 false/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Good morning, @. Seems some habits are hard to break...#$b#Anyway, would you like to hear the end of the story?"/quickQuestion #Yes, of course!#Well, I suppose. If you insist.#Not really, but I'm sure you'll tell me anyway.(break)speak MisterGinger "Be warned - it's not a very happy one.$2"(break)speak MisterGinger "Oh, I do. I need you to know... so you can see who I truly am."(break)speak MisterGinger "Hah, you know me well, @, even in this form.#$b#I trust you will not find it too tedious."/pause 500/viewport -100 -100/warp MisterGinger -1000 -1000/warp farmer -1000 -1000/animate GingerCute false true 250 0 1 3 12 13 14 15/emote GingerCute 24/speak MisterGinger "The witch didn't leave me there in the cave. No, she took me away and dumped me in the countryside, far from home.$2#$b#I could barely remember who I was, who I had been.#$b#There was one memory that I clung to, however.#$b#Her. #$b#I learned to hunt, and to follow the tingle in my whiskers."/pause 500/changeLocation Town/warp MarnShane 47 88/stopAnimation GingerCute/warp GingerCute 45 91/showFrame GingerCute 12/speak MisterGinger "But when I finally found my way home, I was too late.$2"/fade/playMusic desolate/viewport 45 89/pause 2500/animate MarnShane false false 450 0 1 2/showFrame MarnShane 2/pause 2500/animate GingerCute false false 350 16 17 18 19 19 19/pause 2000/showFrame GingerCute 19/pause 5000/viewport -100 -100/warp MarnShane -1000 -1000/speak MisterGinger "But within the darkness, there was one bright spark.#$b#Her daughter.#$b#Our daughter."/stopMusic/warp MarnCute 49 31 2 false/showFrame MarnCute 0/warp JasCute 50 31/warp GingerCute 50 35/showFrame JasCute 0/pause 500/viewport 50 34/fade/pause 1000/animate GingerCute false false 250 12 13 14 15/pause 1000/showFrame JasCute 1/emote JasCute 20/pause 500/textAboveHead JasCute "Kitty!"/pause 500/showFrame GingerCute 0/pause 500/faceDirection GingerCute 0/pause 500/animate JasCute false false 250 1 2 3/emote GingerCute 16/pause 500/move GingerCute 0 -3 2/showFrame Jas 2/showFrame GingerCute 18/pause 500/faceDirection MarnCute 1/pause 250/emote GingerCute 20/emote MarnCute 32/pause 1000/viewport -100 -100/speak MisterGinger "And from that day on, I was Jas's cat - and Jas was my human.#$b#Never a pet, but a friend.#$b#We were happy. I watched her grow and flourish. Cherished her, when her mother could not.$2#$b#She's surrounded by so much love, of that I'm glad."/pause 500/changeLocation Farm/warp MisterGinger 64 17 3/warp farmer 64 16 1/viewport 64 18/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "So now, @, you understand why Jasmine - Jas - is so important to me.$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 2000/end

I'm afraid I've already signed an allegiance to this human.#$b#But, well, my priorities could be shifted. What's your offer?$1"/emote farmer 12/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/speak MisterGinger "Just kidding, @!$4"/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 0/speak Marlon "I hear your cat has been quite the hero, @."/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 12/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/speak MisterGinger "I'm right here, graybeard, you can talk to me you know!"/pause 500/speak Marlon "And we were wondering if he might be interested in joining the Adventurer's Guild?"/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 16/jump MisterGinger 3/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "The Adventurer's Guild! Entries.Town_47_87: $1 Mona_Memory#Mona and I were friends, you know, until she went and fell in love with some idiot guy. Yeah, I know, I'm jealous. Shouldn't be; Tristan's dead now too. Well, probably. They never found his body.$6|Just catching Mona up with what's going on in the village. Heard any good goss recently?$4
Entries.summer_inlaw_MisterGinger: I can't believe you married a cat, @! That's wild.$1#$b#Still, you could do a lot worse than Pumpkin.#$b#And who knows? Maybe what Jas says is true. Maybe he is more than just a cat.$6

Entries.fall_inlaw_MisterGinger: I was wandering past your farm and saw a stranger in your fields. He looked kind of familiar.$2#$b#Is there something you're not telling me, @? I thought we were friends!$5

Entries.fall_Mon4: Have you met Mr. Ginger? He's sort of a cat, but also more than a cat. He's my friend!
Entries.fall_Mon8: You know the man in the tower? He's a wizard.#$b#Aunt Marnie told me I shouldn't talk to him, but he must be lonely, living in that tower all by himself.#$b#Mr. Ginger visits him sometimes.
Entries.winter_Mon10: Do you think Mr. Rasmodius is anything like Chrestomanci$3?#$b#How do I know his name? Mr. Ginger told me!$1#$b#Oh, I know _cats_ can't talk. But Mr. Ginger is more than a cat.#$b#What is he then? That's a secret!
Entries.summer_Tue6: Mr. Ginger loves me reading him stories. He really, really likes 'East of the Sun...'#$b#It's a fairy tale about a bear, only he isn't really a bear. He's enchanted!$1#$b#*giggles* Anyway, I just thought you should know! No reason!$4
Entries.winter_Sun6_inlaw_MisterGinger: I hope Mr. Ginger's happy living with you! I miss him, but I've got Uncle Shane and Aunt Marnie - and all the other animals.
Entries.spring_Mon6_inlaw_MisterGinger: Mr. Ginger's a great friend. He's special you know. Has he told you his secret yet? *giggles*$1#$b#No, I'm not gonna! I promised not to tell.$4

Entries.winter_Sun6_inlaw_MisterGinger: You broke the spell! I'm so excited! It's so romantic - like something out of a fairy tale!$1
Entries.spring_Mon8_inlaw_MisterGinger: I wish Da- I mean, Tristan - would stop hiding from everyone. But I think he's scared.$2#$b#Even though Uncle Shane's not scary!$1
Entries.summer_Wed6_inlaw_MisterGinger: You know, my father and Shane used to be friends. They need to talk. Tell Da - I mean Tristan - they've gotta talk.
Entries.fall_Sun8_inlaw_MisterGinger: Are you and Tristan gonna have kids? Oh, sorry. Uncle Shane says it's rude to ask that question...$4#$b#... but are you? I'd have a secret brother or sister!$1
